mapper.select: SELECT STATE FROM TD_CUST_INFO WHERE MERCHANT_CODE=#{merchantCode}

SELECT a.*, a.MERCHANT_EMAIL as email, a.MERCHANT_MOBILE as mobile, c.SCAN_COPY_PATH as businessLicenseFPath, c2.SCAN_COPY_PATH as openAccountPath, c1.SCAN_COPY_PATH as idCardFPath, c1.CERTIFY_BEGIN_TIME , c1.CERTIFY_END_TIME, c3.SCAN_COPY_PATH as bankCardPhotoPath, c4.SCAN_COPY_PATH as idCardScPhotoPath, a.representative_cert_no as representativeCertNo, a.REPRESENTATIVE_NAME as representativeName, a.representative_addr as custAdd FROM td_login_user_info t LEFT JOIN td_cust_info a ON t.cust_id = a.cust_id LEFT JOIN TD_CERTIFICATE_AUTH h ON h.cust_id = t.cust_id LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_SCAN_COPY c ON h.auth_id = c.auth_id and c.CERTIFY_TYPE='02' LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_SCAN_COPY c1 ON h.auth_id = c1.auth_id and c1.CERTIFY_TYPE='04' LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_SCAN_COPY c2 ON h.auth_id = c2.auth_id and c2.CERTIFY_TYPE='03' LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_SCAN_COPY c3 ON h.auth_id = c3.auth_id and c3.CERTIFY_TYPE='07' LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_SCAN_COPY c4 ON h.auth_id = c4.auth_id and c4.CERTIFY_TYPE='11' WHERE a.merchant_code = #{merchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TD_AUDIT_RECODE_INFO WHERE MERCHANT_CODE=#{merchantCode} AND AUDIT_TYPE=#{auditType}
mapper.select: SELECT t.bank_code, t.bank_type, t.bank_name, t.my_bank_type, t.city_code, t.ccpc, t.order_by FROM tb_bank_code t WHERE t.bank_code = #{bankCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT APPLY_ID FROM TD_MERCHANT_APPLY_INFO WHERE MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId}
